sections.title: 1. Data Controller and Collected Data
sections.body:
As Falio ("Application"), we process your personal data as a data controller in accordance with the Law on Protection of Personal Data No. 6698 ("KVKK") and relevant legislation. Collected data includes:

• Identity Information: Name, surname, birth date, gender.
• Contact Information: E-mail address.
• Visual and Audio Records: Photos uploaded for fortune interpretation.
• Transaction Security Information: IP address, device information, log records.
• Marketing Information: Cookie records, usage habits.

sections.title: 2. Purposes of Processing Personal Data
sections.body:
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

• Performing membership transactions and providing user login.
• Providing fortune interpretation service and delivering results.
• Executing in-app purchase and subscription transactions.
• Meeting customer support requests.
• Fulfilling legal obligations and informing authorized authorities.
• Ensuring application security and preventing fraudulent transactions.

sections.title: 3. Transfer of Personal Data
sections.body: Your data may be shared with our business partners (payment institutions, server service providers) for the purpose of providing the service and with authorized public institutions and organizations in case of legal obligation. Your data is stored on secure servers (Supabase etc.).

sections.title: 4. Data Storage and Destruction
sections.body: Your personal data is stored for the period required by the processing purpose and taking into account the legal statute of limitations. At the end of the period or upon your request, your data will be deleted, destroyed or anonymized. Fortune photos may be automatically deleted from the system within a certain period of time after the interpretation process is completed.

sections.title: 5. Rights of the Data Subject
sections.body:
Pursuant to Article 11 of KVKK;

• Learning whether your personal data is processed,
• Requesting information if processed,
• Learning the purpose of processing and whether it is used in accordance with its purpose,
• Knowing the third parties to whom it is transferred domestically or abroad,
• Requesting correction if incomplete or incorrectly processed,
• Requesting deletion or destruction.

You can make a request regarding these rights from the "Contact Us" section in the application or from our support e-mail address.

sections.title: 6. Cookies
sections.body: Cookies and similar technologies may be used to improve the application experience and collect analytical data. You can manage your cookie preferences from your device settings.

sections.title: 7. Changes
sections.body: This Privacy Policy may be updated depending on legal regulations or service changes. The current text becomes effective on the date it is published on the application.

sections.title: 1. Parties and Subject
sections.body: These Terms of Use ("Agreement") are concluded between the Falio mobile application ("Application") and the user who is a member of the Application ("User"). By downloading or using the Application, you are deemed to have accepted these terms.

sections.title: 2. Scope of Service
sections.body: The Application offers entertainment-purpose fortune interpretations in line with the photos and information sent by users. The content offered is purely for entertainment purposes; it does not carry the nature of medical, legal, financial or psychological advice. The User should not make decisions regarding their life based on the interpretations.

sections.title: 3. Membership and Account Security
sections.body: The User declares that the information provided when creating a membership is correct and up-to-date. The user is responsible for account security (password etc.). Account information belonging to someone else cannot be used. The Application reserves the right to suspend or close the account in suspicious situations.

sections.title: 4. Usage Rules and Prohibitions
sections.body:
The User cannot use the Application for purposes contrary to law and morality. The following actions are prohibited:

• Sending content that is disturbing to others, insulting or threatening.
• Using software or code that will damage the technical structure of the Application.
• Sharing content that violates copyright.
• Making transactions with misleading or fake information.

sections.title: 5. Paid Services and Refunds
sections.body: Some services within the Application (credit purchase, premium membership etc.) may be paid. Purchase transactions are carried out via App Store / Google Play. Since it is in the nature of digital content, the right of withdrawal and refund is not possible after the service is performed. However, in case of a technical error, platform rules apply.

sections.title: 6. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.body: The design, software, logo and content of the Application belong to Falio. Users cannot copy, distribute or use these materials for commercial purposes without permission.

sections.title: 7. Disclaimer
sections.body: The Application does not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. It cannot be held responsible for interruptions caused by technical problems, maintenance works or force majeure. Fortune interpretations are subjective and do not promise certainty.

sections.title: 8. Termination of Agreement
sections.body: The User can terminate the agreement by deleting their account at any time. The Application may unilaterally close the user account if it detects behavior contrary to the rules.

sections.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
sections.body: Turkish Law applies to disputes arising from this Agreement and Istanbul Courts and Enforcement Offices are authorized.
